name: Alycia LANE v. CBS BROADCASTING INC., Michael Colleran, and Lawrence Mendte. Petition of Lawrence Mendte. Alycia Lane v. CBS Broadcasting Inc., Michael Colleran, and Lawrence Mendte, Defendant. Petition of Lawrence Mendte

parties: Alycia LANE v. CBS BROADCASTING INC., Michael Colleran, and Lawrence Mendte. Petition of Lawrence Mendte. Alycia Lane v. CBS Broadcasting Inc., Michael Colleran, and Lawrence Mendte, Defendant. Petition of Lawrence Mendte.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of November, 2015, Lawrence Mendte’s Petition to Join in Allowance of Appeal Out of Time is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
125 A.3d 407
Alycia LANE v. CBS BROADCASTING INC., Michael Colleran, and Lawrence Mendte. Petition of Lawrence Mendte. Alycia Lane v. CBS Broadcasting Inc., Michael Colleran, and Lawrence Mendte, Defendant. Petition of Lawrence Mendte.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 4, 2015.
